title: Not receiving 'Lil Devil Teemo icon
body:
I saw my friends get it quite a bit around the same time, and its been a couple days after its official end and i figured it was just taking a bit to arrived, but i have yet to get it after winning multiple games of doom bots, and Im not if it still needs time or something went wrong, but it states something about abandoning the said game you won wouldn't give a icon, but i didn't abandon any, but i did go afk from one due to my computer crashing, but managed to get back (albeit too late to salvage anything)

~Thanks in advance! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: If you've won any *Doom Bots* mode without going AFK, then you should still be getting the icon. We're granting these over time until *November 17th*. If you don't have it by then, reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll take care of ya.
Thanks, the note on the 'Lil demon teemo wasn't quite specific so thanks for clarifying.
